name: Pokemon Rex Version V1.6
description:
This does have curse words in it. This is still a work in progress. 

As you might imagine, this game is not affiliated or endorsed with/by Nintendo or Game Freak. Also worth noting is that this game contains some assets I've used without permission i do NOT own them. 

This is just a fun little project to help myself learn how to get into coding.

If you have any questions/ideas or a bug to report contact me at ThunderLord79@gmail.com
